type.description:
## Offset

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/offset)

Checks the provided [Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/offset) at a position offset from the current position.

Type ID: `origins:offset`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:offset",
    "condition": {
        "type": "origins:block",
        "block": "minecraft:grass_block"
    },
    "y": 1
}
```

This example will check if the block above the block is a Grass Block.
